title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When attempting to close all saved files, the system does not always close the files as expected.
EB: It should close all saved files, without exception, as no changes have been made to them.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open multiple saved files.
2. Choose the 'Close all saved' option from the menu or toolbar.
3. Observe that not all files are closed, despite being saved and no changes made to them.
